Form1.Label35: Please use on the main monitor as much as possible; moving between monitors with different scaling can easily cause font size issues in SunnyUI. If issues occur on the main monitor, please report them directly.
Form1.Label1: When seeking help, please provide error messages, task command lines, and parameter overviews immediately. Stay focused and mature; venting emotions, complaining, or guessing won't solve anything.
Form1.Label21: The main logic of 3FUI is to set options in the Parameter Panel first, then drag files into the Encoding Queue to start automatically. Ask AI about any concepts you don't understand; these are all terms found on Wikipedia.
Form1.Label126: Even as an official version, 3FUI still has much room for improvement and bugs to fix. Suggestions and fixes are welcome; many issues exist but have never been reported.
Form1.Label副标题: Add ffmpeg.exe to PATH or place it in the 3FUI directory to use
界面_设置.Label47:
You can use any installed font. Observe the text change on the right.
MacType is recommended for <150% scaling.
Form1.Label45: Latest output saves up to 1000 lines; viewing this info during tasks may affect experience
Form1.Label2: You can drag files directly into the Encoding Queue to start. Use this page if you have many files or other needs.
Form1.Label102: Each file is an independent task and does not affect others!
Form1.Label123: Call ffprobe.exe to show output info directly. Drag files to the Open button; incompatible with Translation Mode!
Form1.Label27: Some processors have hundreds of cores, which severely burdens the UI thread on refresh. Use Task Manager instead.
Form1.Label31: Track usage of each CPU core and all active GPU cores
Form1.Label16: Refer to GitHub README for plugin development details
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label128: These functions are handled by 3FUI after the task ends, not by ffmpeg
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label1: Use Auto-Naming (Disabling doesn't affect custom characters)
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label2: No Output File Params (Special use, beginners beware)
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label76: Output directory is not saved in presets by default; check the extra save box if needed
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label13: If multiple GPUs of the same brand are installed, specify which one to use (may be invalid)
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label11: Required if decoding and encoding use different hardware acceleration
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label9: Specify decoding threads if using CPU decoding (usually unnecessary)
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label8: Do not set if you don't know what it is! Applies to all settings on this page!
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label167: Specify card for multiple same-brand GPUs (Likely NVIDIA only, others via system/driver)
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label136: Many values for the above three parameters are not yet included; feedback welcome
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label26: Tune: Optimization for specific needs (usually unnecessary)
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label22: Preset: Balance compression vs speed; higher is slower, lower is faster
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label27: Video Encoder General Config (Parameter names vary by encoder, auto-mapped)
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label21: lib = CPU   nvenc = NVIDIA   qsv = Intel   amf = AMD
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label19: Categories above are for convenience; this is the actual encoder name
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label16: Select category first, then specific encoder. Custom ones can be added in config.
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label37: Very mediocre effect, recommended for temporary use only
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label33: Specify frames per second. Do not drop frames if external subtitles are needed!
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label31: Crop a region. Cannot be used with resolution. Use the visual interactive window! Do not hardcode!
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label28: Specify width and height. Use auto-calc to maintain aspect ratio if scaling is needed.
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label56: Use F3 and F4 to reorder
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label49: Add preset or empty item then edit parameters; write internal encoder args in Custom Parameters
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label44: Traditional transcoding specifies bitrate directly; usually not considered for encoding work
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label40: Software: crf, NVIDIA: cq, Intel: global_quality, AMD: qp_i, qp_p (Advanced)
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label61: For standard conversions, choose Write Metadata and Convert
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label65: Color Range: Most videos are Limited, not Full
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label64: Transfer Characteristics: Non-linear relationship between values and light
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label63: Color Primaries: Which color standard to use
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label62: Matrix Coefficients / Pixel Format: Luma/Chroma distribution
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label81: Set all options except optional ones
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label147: Do not leave selected if unused; filters have their own defaults
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label80: zscale (CPU); libplacebo (GPU) Recommended for Dolby Vision conversion
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label57: How pixels are stored; shows available options based on selected encoder
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label160: Use DaVinci Resolve for advanced grading
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label72: Emphasize edges, increase clarity appropriately. Suggested: Size 3, Strength 1
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label68: Place AviSynth.avs script in app directory. Use <FilePath> for input path.
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label66: Remove noise; fill all four params; watermark text is not the default value!
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label94: Peak Level: CN Broadcast -2, Int'l -1 (Should not exceed)
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label91: Target Loudness: CN -24, Int'l -23. Larger is louder, max -16 recommended
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label135: Check supported channels per encoder (AAC max 5.1)
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label134: Quality Mode (No Bitrate). Check encoder's quality range.
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label15: How to encode avif high compression images
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label154: Reminder: Don't save precious memories as avif. AV1 details smearing issues exist; prefer webp.
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label161: ffmpeg does not support heic / heif
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label162: Use other software or develop separately for this format
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label121: Image parameters are video parameters, placed here for classification
界面_常规流程参数_V2.TextBox1: Wildcards are case-sensitive. Quotes are not added to paths automatically; handle them yourself.
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label97: Maximum freedom for niche fields and deep professionals
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label138: If 'subtitles' filter fails with: Error applying option 'original_size'... Invalid argument
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label106: When Fully Custom, all other parameters are ignored
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label153: Do not confuse with forward reference frames. Forward decode means towards the beginning.
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label151: For fast response fine cut only; ensure forward time includes keyframe, otherwise worse than rough cut
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label143: Fine cut must re-encode to be frame-accurate! ffmpeg cannot be frame-accurate without re-encoding
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label109: Rough Cut (Instant): Keyframe positioning, fast but inaccurate.
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label108: Applies only to the first -i file
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label165: Forces -map usage as these cannot be handled generally otherwise
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label166: file_index:s:stream_index; 0:s means all subtitle streams of 1st file
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label140: file_index:a:stream_index; 0:a means all audio streams of 1st file
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label113: Apply audio params to which files/streams (a)
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label139: file_index:v:stream_index; 0:v means all video streams of 1st file
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label114: Apply video params to which files/streams (v)
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label107: ffmpeg's -map has high priority. When used, other stream types must also have -map.
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label142: Auto-load: Due to Tab control mechanism, auto-load only happens when switching to Parameters panel
界面_常规流程参数_V2.Label123: Not guaranteed cross-version compatible. Using non-current versions may fail to restore settings or crash.
界面_混流.Label1: Add input files, select to edit streams. F3/F4 to sort, Delete to remove.
界面_混流.Label123: Basic muxing only. For advanced features use MKVToolNix GUI; for extraction use MKVExtract GUI.
界面_合并.Label1: Use F3/F4 to sort, Delete to remove.
界面_合并.Label123: Basic merge only (stream copy). Requires identical parameters. Use editing software for advanced needs.
界面_设置.Label30: All settings auto-saved on exit to Settings.json in app directory.
界面_设置.Label字体预览文本: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
界面_设置.Label48: Set CPU affinity for new tasks (Task Manager Processor Affinity)
界面_设置.UiComboBox自动重置参数面板的页面选择: Do not reset Parameter Panel page (Recommended)
界面_设置.Label50: Reset to first page when switching back to Parameter Panel from main tab?
界面_设置.Label20: Auto-start tasks? (If off, tasks must be started manually and won't chain)
界面_设置.UiComboBox有任务时系统状态: Prevent Sleep but allow Screen Off
界面_设置.Label33: System state during tasks (Prevent Screen Off recommended if headless)
界面_设置.UiCheckBox转译模式: Translation Mode (Remove drive letters, slash to division)
界面_设置.Label40: Override Process Args, use <args> for 3FUI generated params
界面_设置.Label5: 3FUI Supporter Pack provides personalization only. All productivity features are free.
界面_设置.Label4: Buy FFmpegFreeUI Supporter Pack to unlock personalization
界面_设置.Label21: This lets me know how many people are using 3FUI.
